Text: The Johan Cruyff Shield (Dutch: Johan Cruijff Schaal ) is a football trophy in the Netherlands named after the Dutch football player Johan Cruyff, also often referred to as the Dutch Super Cup.

Text: Johan Cruyff Shield:  In the event of a team winning both the Eredivisie and the KNVB Cup, the Johan Cruyff Shield will be contested between that team and the runner up in the national league.

<Text: Johan Cruyff Shield:  The match traditionally opens the Dutch football season in August one week before the Eredivisie starts.>
